Publications

Zhou, J. & Venayagamoorthy, S. K. 2020 Gravity currents propagating over and through cylinder arrays: Effect of submergence condition. Environmental Fluid Mechanics, in preparation.

Zhou, J. & Stacey, M. T. 2019 Baroclinically-driven sediment-transport pathways in estuarine channels: 2. Parametric dependence and implications for longitudinal sediment convergence and divergence. Journal of Geophysical Research Oceans, nearing submission.

Zhou, J. & Stacey, M. T. 2019 Baroclinically-driven sediment-transport pathways in estuarine channels: 1. Mechanisms of tidal pumping and effect of lateral circulation. Journal of Geophysical Research Oceans, nearing submission.

Zhou, J. & Venayagamoorthy, S. K. 2019 Impact of ambient stable stratification on gravity currents propagating over asubmerged canopy. Journal of Fluid Mechanics, submitted

Zhou, J., Stacey, M. T., Holleman, R. C., Nuss, E. & Senn, D. B. 2019 Intratidal and residual dynamics of partially stratified estuaries with channel-shoal morphology. Journal of Geophysical Research Oceans, in revision.

Zhou, J. & Venayagamoorthy, S. K. 2019 Near-field mean flow dynamics of a cylindrical canopy patch suspended in deep water. Journal of Fluid Mechanics 858, 634-655.

Zhou, J., Cenedese, C., Williams, T., Ball, M., Venayagamoorthy, S. K. & Nokes, I. R. 2017 On the propagation of gravity currents over and through a submerged array of circular cylinders. Journal of Fluid Mechanics 831, 394-417.

Zhou, J. & Venayagamoorthy, S. K. 2017 Numerical simulations of intrusive gravity currents interacting with a bottom-mounted obstacle in a continuously stratified ambient. Environmental Fluid Mechanics 17, 191-209.

Fang, G., Zhou, J., & Zhao, L. 2013 Evaluation of harmonious development between water conservancy and economy-society in Jiangsu Province (in Chinese). China Rural Water and Hydropower 6, 117-120.

Zhou, J., Fang, G., Wen, X. & Zhuang, J. 2013 Post evaluation of urban flood control planning of Nanjing City (in Chinese). Journal of Economics of Water Resources 31(3), 21-23.

Fang, G., Luo, Q., Huang, X., Yan, K., Wen, X. & Zhou, J. 2011 On the carrying capacity of regional water resources based on ecological footprint model (in Chinese). Water Resources and Power 10, 12-14.

Luo, Q., Fang G., Huang, X., Yan, K., Wen, X. Zhou, J. & Zhuang, J. 2011 Utilization potential of rainwater resources in water-deficient areas of a lower river basin (in Chinese). Water Resources and Power 29(12), 5-7.
